Title: Quadpill once daily

Description: This is describing an intervention used in the QUARTET USA Trial.

Product: Quadpill (candesartan 2 mg, amlodipine 1.25 mg, indapamide 0.625 mg, and bisoprolol 2.5 mg)

Dosage: One pill by mouth once daily
